name: anonaddy
tagline: An email aliasing service that protects real addresses through encrypted forwarding
description: AnonAddy is an email aliasing service that helps you protect your real email. It supports encrypted forwarding, multiple domains, custom subdomains, and can be fully self-hosted as a privacy-focused alternative to commercial aliasing tools.

features.title: Email Aliasing
features.description: Create unlimited aliases to protect your real email address. Hide your identity

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Emails forwarded with PGP encryption support. Secure communication

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Use your own domains for professional-looking aliases. Brand your privacy

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full privacy with your own server deployment. No third-party access
